fix.text: function ab(ah){var ag=ah.charCodeAt(0);if(ag!==92){return ag}var af=ah.charAt(1);ag=Y[af];if(ag){return ag}if("0"<=af&&af<="7"){return parseInt(ah.substring(1),8)}else{if(af==="u"||af==="x"){return parseInt(ah.substring(2),16)}else{return ah.charCodeAt(1)}}}
